evidence.claim: IONIQ Sciences utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions.
The company incorporates FHIR and HL7 standards in their health-tech solutions.
Use of X12 for electronic data interchange as part of their healthcare integrations.
Integration with Amazon S3 for data storage and retrieval.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 transactions and APIs for health tech, indicating integration with payers/providers.
